casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Tecumseh Products Company, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Tecumseh Products Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 181.]

(No. 95-2190 Submitted May 12, 1998 Decided June 17, 1998.) Bugbee & Conkle, Robert P. King and David M. McCarty, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J. McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio. *182Chester T. Freeman Co., L.P.A., and William R. Polhamus, for appellee John Dear.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
